definition: service to the public/public welfare undertaking/charity/social facility

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already

sentences.english: Article 66 The trustee of a public trust must not resign without the approval of the regulatory agency of public undertakings.
sentences.chinese: 信托的受托人未经公益事业管理机构批准，不得辞任。

sentences.english: In doing so, they’ve demonstrated fantastic principles for grassroots-based cause efforts.
sentences.chinese: 通过这种方式，它们证明了草根公益事业的独特原则。

sentences.english: Hot loyal to public welfare, has repeatedly Voluntary Blood Donation.
sentences.chinese: 热忠于公益事业，曾屡次义务献血。

sentences.english: Revenues from horse racing is all used for public welfares.
sentences.chinese: 比赛所得的收入会用在社会公益事业上。

sentences.english: The Hope Project is a commonweal undertaking.
sentences.chinese: 希望工程是一项公益事业。

sentences.english: Business units under Jardines have been very supportive on philanthropic initiatives.
sentences.chinese: 怡和旗下很多业务单位都积极参与公益事业。

sentences.english: In addition to space flight, Ansari has an interest in social entrepreneurship.
sentences.chinese: 除太空飞行外，安萨里还热衷于社会公益事业。

sentences.english: Along with the development of the company, Yu Bin actively engaged in public welfare.
sentences.chinese: 在发展公司的同时，俞斌积极投身于社会公益事业。

sentences.english: Ocean observing and forecasting is a basic public welfare service for economic development, national defense, social development and people's well being.
sentences.chinese: 海洋观测预报是国家的一项基础性公益事业。

definition: to help the poor/almsgiving for the needy/to assist poor households or poor regions
to donate money/to contribute funds/donation/contribution (of money)
to donate goods (to a relief effort)/to contribute material
compassion/kindness/care for others/love/CL:片[pian4]/charity (bazaar, golf day etc)/heart (the symbol ♥)
